subject_and_pose: A photorealistic medium-full shot of a beautiful young Japanese woman with platinum blonde hair and fair skin. She has an athletic full hourglass figure. She is standing with her back to the camera, turning her head over her left shoulder to look directly at the viewer with a sultry, captivating expression. Her hands are placed on the vertical frames of a large floor-to-ceiling window, posing confidently with a slight arch in her back.
outfit: She is wearing a form-fitting, glossy white latex bodysuit with long sleeves and a mock neck. The bodysuit features a high-cut thong back that accentuates her figure. She is also wearing matching thigh-high white leather boots with a shiny finish.
environment: The setting is a high-rise apartment or hotel room at night, standing directly in front of a large glass window. The background reveals a vibrant, out-of-focus city skyline (bokeh effect) with dazzling blue, white, and amber city lights. A faint reflection of a warm interior lamp is visible on the glass pane.
lighting_and_shot: Cinematic night lighting. The subject is softly illuminated, highlighting the texture of the leather and the sheen of her platinum blonde hair. The background is blurred to create a shallow depth of field, keeping the focus sharp on the subject. High contrast, photorealistic quality, 8k resolution, shot on 35mm lens.
